Name: Dream/strung - Blossoming Love
About the game: Synopsis: A beautiful young woman who keeps being abducted meets another feminine figure. Little does she know, their fates are intertwined. Follow the adventure of our two protagonists as they get into and away from many unusual situations; slowly nurturing their love for each other. The adventure is about two characters meeting for the first time, getting to know one another as they grow an unusual relationship. The whole game features: - 24 scenes. - 64 CG. - Live2D animated sprites. - BDSM-related fetishes (mainly bondage.) Mouse Controls: LEFT Button - Confirm/Proceed RIGHT Button - Cancel Wheel - Scroll Up/Down (Gallery and Backlog) + Activate Backlog Hover - Selects the hovered item Key Controls: [ENTER] - Confirm/Proceed [ESC] - Cancel/Exit [A] - Auto Mode [S/CTRL (Hold)] - Skip Text [P] - Pause [H] - Hide UI [Q] - Save [L] - Load [O] - Options/Settings [K] - Backlog [SHIFT] - Hide UI/Swap CG (Gallery) [LEFT/RIGHT/UP/DOWN] - Select Item (Menus and Choices) [UP/DOWN] - Scroll Up/Down (Gallery and Backlog) [F9] - Complete Skip (unavailable during certain scenes) [F10] - Controls Screen [F12] - Credits Screen
